languages.text: "Дурное место. Давайте принесем Всеотцу щедрую жертву на алтаре песнопений, а затем все тут сожжем".
"A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
languages.original_text: "Дурное место. Давайте принесем Всеотцу щедрую жертву на алтаре песнопений, а затем все тут сожжем".

traits.locale_text: "A bad place, this is. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all down."
"A bad place, this is. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all down."
"A bad place, this is. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
"A bad place, this is. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
"A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
"A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
"A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

languages.text: "Ein schändlicher Ort. Bieten wir dem Allvater am Altar der Gesänge ein großzügiges Opfer dar und brennen dann alles nieder."
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

traits.locale_text: "Ein schändlicher Ort. Bieten wir dem Allvater am Altar der Gesänge ein großzügiges Opfer dar und brennen dann alles nieder."

languages.text: « Un antre de perdition s'il en est. Déposons une belle offrande au Père de Tous sur l'autel des chants, et réduisons les lieux en cendres. »
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

traits.locale_text: « Un antre de perdition s'il en est. Déposons une belle offrande au Père de Tous sur l'autel des chants, et réduisons les lieux en cendres. »

languages.text: «Estamos en un lugar maldito. Ofrezcamos un tributo abundante al Padre de todas las cosas en el altar de los cánticos y luego arrasémoslo».
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos en un lugar maldito. Ofrezcamos un tributo abundante al Padre de todas las cosas en el altar de los cánticos y luego arrasémoslo».

languages.text: 「この場所は堕ちている。詠唱の祭壇で全知の父に豊かな賛辞を捧げ、すべてを焼き尽くそう」
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所は堕ちている。詠唱の祭壇で全知の父に豊かな賛辞を捧げ、すべてを焼き尽くそう」

languages.text: “这个地方充满了堕落。我们应该在祭坛上为全父献上丰盛的祭品，之后把这个地方彻底烧成灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方充满了堕落。我们应该在祭坛上为全父献上丰盛的祭品，之后把这个地方彻底烧成灰烬。”

languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."

languages.text: "Burası habis bir yer. İlahiler sunağında Yücebaba'ya cömert bir adak adayalım. Sonra da burayı yakıp yıkalım."
languages.original_text: "A fell place is this. Let us offer a bountiful tribute to the Allfather at the altar of chants, and then burn it all to the ground."
